# banner_Mingk42

### Usage
When type `show-banner`,then display banner.
```bash
$ show-banner

    __               __  ____
   / /   ____ ______/ /_/ __ \____ _____  ________
  / /   / __ `/ ___/ __/ / / / __ `/ __ \/ ___/ _ \
 / /___/ /_/ (__  ) /_/ /_/ / /_/ / / / / /__/  __/
/_____/\__,_/____/\__/_____/\__,_/_/ /_/\___/\___/

```
